##Packages

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(xts)
library(fUnitRoots)
```

## Loading Data

```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/data.csv")
```


```{r}
data %>% glimpse()
```
```{r}
data$date <- as.Date(data$date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
data <- xts(data[, -1], order.by = data$date)
```

```{r}
data$dy5 <- diff.xts(data$y5)
data$dy7 <- diff.xts(data$y7)
```

```{r}
source("functions/testdf.R")
```

## Find one pair of cointegrated time series out of ten considered time series.

```{r}
testdf(variable = data$y5,
       max.augmentations = 3)
testdf(variable = data$dy5, 
       max.augmentations = 3)
```


```{r}
testdf(variable = ppi_cpi$y, 
       max.augmentations = 3)
testdf(variable = ppi_cpi$dppi, 
       max.augmentations = 3)
```
